A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What can I say? Is it better than Empire?... No\, but almost. Does it live up to the Force Awakens?... It most definitely does. Is it a stunning visual masterpiece that made me rethink the whole Star Wars franchise?... it would be an obvious lie if I said no.
I praise Rian Johnson for his work\, he blew me at a level I could not even imagine. He gives the best action sequences in a Star Wars film and a compelling narrative that does justice to the universe and the heroes alike. 
The acting delivered is just incredible. Mark Hamill shines\, Daisy Ridley is marvelous\, Adam Driver's performance is staggeringly good and the late Carrie Fisher is simply amazing. The movie is a beautiful tribute to her career. Just go watch it.

Can't wait for Episode 9!!!
